c74object.name: abc.hoa.encoder~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.encoder~ is an 2D High Order Ambisonics (HOA) encoder.
This object enable to create punctual sources either in rotation at a certain speed or static and located at a precise angle (in degrees) on the ambisonic circle.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: the ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: a[index]
attribute.description: sets the angle of the [index]th encoded signal in degree.[index] is an integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the angle of the encoded signal in degree

attribute.name: s[index]
attribute.description: sets the rotation speed of the [index]th encoded signal in turn/s. [index] is an integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-100:max=100:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the angle of the encoded signal in degree

attribute.name: returntime
attribute.description: sets the return time in ms of the encoded source to come back to intial position after rotation speed goes back to 0 [init=20:min=0:max=1000:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: a[index]
method.description: sets the angle of the [index]th encoded signal in degree.[index] is an integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: s[index]
method.description: sets the return time in ms of the encoded source to come back to intial position after rotation speed goes back to 0 [init=20:min=0:max=1000:step=1].
method.digest: sets the angle of the encoded signal in degree
